_header: All that will a while here dwell / Harkeneth
Subjects: Alexis, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: ‘The Lyfe of St. Alexes’ — in couplets

BLCottTitAXXVI.First Lines:
[A]lle þe wille a whylw here dwelleHerkynnythe and I woll yowe
                    tell…
BLCottTitAXXVI.Last Lines:
…Praye we all þt yt soo beeAmen Amen ffor
                    charyte
BLCottTitAXXVI.Note:
Initial ‘A’ of ‘Alle’ is omitted in the text (f.
                    145).

Furnivall,  Frederick James,
